Sweatshirt runs a bit small.  Arms fit nice and were perfect length but the body of the sweatshirt is a little short and snug in the waist.  The screen printing is not of the greatest quality so I don’t anticipate it keeping its appearance for too long.  Also, after only a couple washes it’s already starting to pill.  Overall, it’s a decent sweatshirt but it’s a bit overpriced for the quality.  This is no more than a $20 item at best.  I’ve gotten better stuff at Walmart.

I first saw this product and thought it looked cute. I purchased it thinking it would be another thin sweatshirt or something, however it’s amazing. The material isn’t too thick, but it’s not thin at all either. It keeps me warm, and I’m very excited to wear this when it gets cold! 10/10 would recommend and would buy from this seller again.

If they were “impressed by [his] application, and certain he would excel at Harvard had [they] been able to extend an offer of admission,” then why did they render this sweatshirt ineffective?  I say, pass on this clothing choice. Miami Dade Community College Tank Top is cheaper.
